import React from 'react' import { useEffect } from 'react' import { useState } from 'react' const AccountsDetails = () => { const [bg, setBg] = useState('') const [profit, setProfit] = useState(0) useEffect(() => { setProfit(100) if (profit > 0) { setBg('bg-green-600') } else { setBg('bg-red-500') } }) return (

Income

12000/-

Expense

12000/-

{profit}/-
{/*

*/}
) } export default AccountsDetails
